Reading list

01 Jan 2016
books

The reading list

Here is the list for the 2016...

January

  • David Foster Wallace - The Pale King : wikipedia
  • Antoine Sfeir - L’islam contre l’islam, l’interminable guerre des Chiites et des Sunnites : wikipedia
  • Jean-Paul Sartre - Nausea (La Nausée) : wikipedia
  • Jonathan Franzen - How To Be Alone (essays collection) : wikipedia
  • Cormac McCarty - The Road : wikipedia
  • One - One-Punch Man (manga) : wikipedia

February

  • Neil Gaiman - Smoke and Mirrors (story collection) : wikipedia

March

  • Don DeLillo - Underworld : wikipedia
  • Ursula K. Le Guin - The Dispossessed: An Ambiguous Utopia : wikipedia
  • Chuck Palahniuk - Doomed : wikipedia

April

  • Kazuo Ishiguro - The Buried Giant : wikipedia
  • Ben Marcus (editor) - New American Stories : wikipedia

May

  • Thomas Mann - Death in Venice (and other stories) : wikipedia
  • Yoshihiro Togashi - Hunter x Hunter (manga) vol. 000 to 353 wikipedia
  • J.R.R. Tolkien - The Children of Húrin wikipedia

June

  • Aldous Huxley - Brave New World : wikipedia
  • Truman Capote - A Tree of Night and Other Stories : wikipedia
